name: Qorebit
description:
THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT!
THERE ARE BUGS AND GLITCHES YOU MAY RUN INTO WHILE PLAYING!

FINAL LOOK/CONTENT OF THE GAME WILL DIFFER FROM THE BETA!

Qorebit is a simple rotating, 4 directional, clear lanes puzzle game where blocks will fall and you clear lanes with them.

Gameplay

  • Game - Blocks will fall toward the grid and it is your goal to fill in gaps with the falling blocks and clear lanes (Size of lanes get smaller the more you clear).

Gamemodes

  • Quickplay - a sequence of 4 levels to complete. Doesn't matter how long you take, you just have to complete said 4 levels.
  • Infinite - an almost infinite sequence of levels with difficulty growing for each sequence of levels you have completed.
  • Timed - Complete as many levels as you can with the time you are given (You gain more time for each level completed).

Music & SFX

  • Music - Changes accordingly to how you play (If you do well then you'll hear more of the music)

  • SFX - Changes according to the music!

Bug Fixes and Extra content is coming!

Please leave some comments on your experience with the game below!
